REWORK TRACEABILITY PROCEDURE ENHANCEMENT SURVEY

INTRODUCTION:

We seek your valuable input to refine and enhance our Rework Traceability procedures. Your
feedback will improve our operations' compliance, efficiency, and overall traceability.

Please answer the following questions based on your experiences and observations.

SURVEY QUESTIONS:

1.  IDENTIFICATION AND TRACKING:

•  How are reworked items currently tracked in your department?

•  Have you noticed any gaps in the tracking process? Please provide details.

2.  LABEL INFORMATION:

•  Do the existing labels for reworked products contain all necessary information? If not,

what additional information would be beneficial?

3.  RECORD-KEEPING:

•  Describe how records of reworked items are maintained in your department. What

improvements can ensure these records are more reliable and accessible?

•  Have you encountered any challenges maintaining detailed records, such as capturing

the reason for rework, or the personnel involved? Please specify.

4.  COMPLIANCE AND STANDARDS:

•  Based on your experience, how well does our current process comply with industry

standards for traceability?

•  Are there any compliance aspects or regulatory updates we might be overlooking?

5.  COMMUNICATION AND WORKFLOW:

•  How is information about reworked items communicated between departments? What

improvements would you suggest?

•  Can you provide examples of any issues caused by our current rework procedures?

6.  TECHNOLOGY AND TOOLS:

•  Are the current tools and technology adequate for tracking reworked products? What

enhancements would you recommend?

•  How user-friendly are the current systems for logging rework? Is additional training or

system upgrades needed?

7.  FEEDBACK AND SUGGESTIONS:

•  What specific changes would you suggest streamlining the rework traceability process in

your department?

•  Have you received any feedback from staff concerning the rework process that could

help improve our system?

Conclusion:

Please submit your responses by 19/04/2024 Your insights are invaluable to us, and we appreciate
the time you take to help us enhance our processes.
